title: Pi-network314159
author: Pi-network314159
content: My people I greet ona, this afternoon I been dey sleep, come dream say person wan give me 4 merits, but based on that standby 0 wey dey for that merit distribution box the person come send me 40merits and no be him mind, so for that dream my friend see the merit come call me say guy maga don fall o, I say how? in come tell me say person don mistakenly give me 40merit I say na lie I rushed go login, low and below na true only for me to wake up come see say na dream, I just tire come dey ask myself shebi this people no dey make mistake to give person careless merits?So if it were to be true what will i have done? Will i thank the person or send him back the sendible? And I come dey reason am also say that Merit box for need make them work on am. For example something like this.This image I get am from one thread and na @mk4 naim sudjest am https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5472773.msg63102293#msg63102293Happy weekend my people.

comments.author: Hatchy
comments.body: Quote from: Pi-network314159 on November 25, 2023, 04:27:16 PM So if it were to be true what will i have done? Will i thank the person or send him back the sendible?First of all, no go let your imagination finish you bross, as you dey see am so, no be say e no dey possible o but the chances dey very low. If that kind thing sub, the person no go dey happy with e self. And you thanking the person go only fit make am vex but what is done is already don. You don't go thanking someone for merits.if you receive that kind merit just happy and move on. I no see any reason to con dey thank the person. Secondly. For the tweak wey @ PowerGlove don drop, I go prefer the approach b Quote from: PowerGlove on November 03, 2023, 11:15:22 PM Approach BThis approach would add a bit of JavaScript that "selects" the value whenever it's clicked, that way, whatever you type in will replace whatever was already there.That would look like this (after clicking):The HTML would change to: <input type="text" size="6" name="merits" value="0" onclick="this.select();"> (that is, onclick="this.select();" would be added).That na because, e go dey easier to avoid those kind mistake of sending wrong amount of merit give person, and also with the blue highlight,(java script) wey dey that one, u go fit dey notified of the particular amount wey u dey send before u send am.
